This website from the Mayo Clinic provides information on exercise-induced asthma, also known as exercise-induced bronchoconstriction. It covers symptoms, causes, risk factors, and complications of the condition. It explains how to manage symptoms with asthma medicines and preventive measures. The site also highlights when to seek medical help and offers insights into the triggers of exercise-induced bronchoconstriction. It is a reliable resource for understanding and dealing with this condition.
